hero.subtitle: GloboSense connects companies with the best live interpreters – via video, phone or chat. Simple. No chaos. No delays.

clients.title: GloboSense for clients
clients.intro: A platform for meetings, sales calls and customer support with instant access to online interpreters.
clients.card1.title: One place for all your meetings
clients.card1.text: Combine video calls, phone and chat in one tool. The interpreter joins exactly where you need them.
clients.card2.title: Trusted, verified interpreters
clients.card2.text: We verify experience, specialization and quality of interpreters, so your meetings are safe and effective.
clients.card3.title: Full cost control
clients.card3.text: Transparent billing, per-minute rates and reports showing exactly where and when interpretation is used.
clients.cta.title: Ready to test GloboSense in your organization?
clients.cta.text: We’ll set up a test account and trial calls within minutes.
interpreters.title: Join the GloboSense interpreter network.
interpreters.intro: Work remotely and choose assignments that match your languages and specialization. We handle the technology, you focus on interpreting.
interpreters.benefit1: Flexible hours – log in whenever you want to work.
interpreters.benefit2: Transparent rates and fast online payments.
interpreters.benefit3: Assignments from companies across different industries and markets.
interpreters.panel.title: Interpreter panel
interpreters.panel.text: Overview of available calls, your schedule and statistics of completed sessions in one simple view.
interpreters.stats.rating.label: Average client rating
interpreters.stats.assignments.label: New assignments daily
investors.title: About GloboSense – building the standard for online interpreting.
investors.intro: We connect companies, interpreters and agencies in one scalable ecosystem. We develop our product based on data, user feedback and the global online meetings market.
investors.card1.title: The problem we solve
investors.card1.text: Business operates globally, but interpretation is still organized manually. GloboSense allows clients to connect with the right interpreter in seconds – without emails, spreadsheets or long phone chains.
investors.card2.title: Growth model
investors.card2.text: We focus on supporting companies that run international sales meetings, customer support and technical assistance. We scale as the number of calls grows.
investors.card3.title: Market potential
investors.card3.text: The online meetings market continues to grow, and the need for real-time interpretation is becoming a standard. GloboSense positions itself as the language layer for global communication.
